vsParam:
Marie,
we've gathered the ingredients you wanted.

Oh, thanks!
Yeah, that's it. That's the one I want!

Ho ho...
I'll be able to make that thing with this!

Yes, that thing!
You'll know when I make it out!

Uh, what evil grin? I wasn't grinning...
But please be patient. You'll know when I make it out!

Boo-hoo, that's suspenseful... But I don't think
Marie would make some strange stuff, right?...

I shall start my synthesis now.
It'll be done in a minute. Please be patient!

OK, done!
Come, guys! Drink it!

Uh, how can you make us drink it without saying anything...
What on earth is this thing?

Ah, sorry, I forgot to introduce it.
This medicine is called "bringing smiles to the world"!

It's a medicine of happiness which makes
people smile no matter who you are!

Oh, I see. Everyone will smile after drinking it, huh?
I really want Bergamot Sensei to drink it...

Ho ho, let's try it first.
I'm drinking it... Glug.

Uh... I don't feel like smiling... Ho ho.
Ho ho ho ho... Ha-ha-ha! Hahahaha!?

Why is everyone laughing crazily
instead of smiling!?

Wh-what is this... Hahahahaha!
I can't... stop... laughing... Hee hee hee hee!

Wh-what's going on... Hahahaha!
M-Marie... Ho ho ho ho!

Ah... Maybe the item's properties have changed
because I used ingredients in a different world?

OK, I shall be more careful when using the same recipe.
Lesson learned. Let me note it down...

Hahahahaha! This is not the time for you to take notes...
Ho ho ho ho! Quickly... quickly fix us, hahahaha!
